name: Leap Squirrel
description:
This is one level of the game about a squirrel looking for a hollow.

Control: mouse or tach.

Beware of the spear.

Find the hollow.

Background image, sounds - free assets

Author: 

Mihail Kotkov (Programmer, artist, animator) https://kingelaim.itch.io/

«The game was created while participating in the game jam «Make-A-Level»
